effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 271,711 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 150,038.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 19,948 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 59,845 Nature Damage instead.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,145, up to 10,728.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.5 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
